rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Accessible entrance with ramp and handrails following Vastu orientation. Features a wheelchair-accessible path leading to living areas.

rooms.name: Living Area
rooms.description: Open-plan space combining kitchen, dining and lounge area with integrated wheelchair ramps and accessible furniture layout. Large windows for natural light as per Vastu recommendations.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Separate yet adjoining dining area within the open plan layout, designed to be wide enough for wheelchair maneuverability.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious bedroom with built-in storage and accessible bathroom. Windows on east or north side as per Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Guest Bedrooms
rooms.description: Adjacent to master suite with easy access to shared corridor and designed for wheelchair accessibility.

rooms.name: Servants Quarters
rooms.description: Separate compact living space located adjacent to the kitchen area, ensuring privacy while remaining easily accessible.

openings.description: Wheelchair accessible entrance with ramp and automatic doors.
Large windows for natural light, Vastu-compliant positioning on the east or north side.
Accessible transition between kitchen and living area with a wide door frame.
